text: man-yag geudaedeul-i jaseon-eul deuleonaendamyeon geugeos-eulodo cham-eulo hullyunghanola. geuleona man-yag geudaedeul-i geugeos-eul sumgigo gananhan jadeul-ege jundamyeon geugeos-eun geudaedeul-ege deoug hullyunghan geos-ila. geubunkkeseo geudaedeul-eul wihae geudaedeul-ui aghaeng-eul yongseohae jusil geos-ila. hananimkkeseoneun geudaedeul-i haenghaneun il-e balg-eusin bun-ila
